familyMemberEthics.description: Ivanka Trump received $1,000,001 - $5,000,000 in Capital Gains income from THRIVE PARTNERS II GP, LLC (interest in venture capital fund; New York, NY) the year before her appointment as her father's presidential adviser.
familyMemberEthics.business: THRIVE PARTNERS II GP, LLC (interest in venture capital fund; New York, NY)

familyMemberEthics.description: Jared Kushner received $1,000,001 - $5,000,000 in Capital Gains income from THRIVE PARTNERS II GP, LLC (interest in venture capital fund; New York, NY) the year before his appointment as Pres. Trump's senior adviser.
familyMemberEthics.business: THRIVE PARTNERS II GP, LLC (interest in venture capital fund; New York, NY)
